genius.core.uncertainty

Class AdditiveUtilitySpaceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.uncertainty.AdditiveUtilitySpaceFactory

  • public class AdditiveUtilitySpaceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for building an additive utility space of the form: u(x_1, ..., x_n) = w_1 * e_1(x_1) + ... + w_n * e_n(x_n)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AdditiveUtilitySpaceFactory(Domain d)
      Generates an simple Utility Space on the domain, with equal weights and zero values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      A simple heuristic for estimating a discrete AdditiveUtilitySpace from a BidRanking.

      Returns the utility space that has been created.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdditiveUtilitySpaceFactory

        public AdditiveUtilitySpaceFactory(Domain d)
        Generates an simple Utility Space on the domain, with equal weights and zero values. Everything is zero-filled to already have all keys contained in the utility maps.

    • Method Detail

      • setWeight

                      double weight)
        Sets w_i := weight

      • getUtility

        public double getUtility(Issue i,
                         ValueDiscrete v)

      • estimateUsingBidRanks

        public void estimateUsingBidRanks(BidRanking r)
        A simple heuristic for estimating a discrete AdditiveUtilitySpace from a BidRanking. Gives 0 points to all values occurring in the lowest ranked bid, then 1 point to all values occurring in the second lowest bid, and so on.

      • scaleAllValuesFrom0To1

        public void scaleAllValuesFrom0To1()

        public void normalizeWeights()

        public java.util.List<IssueDiscrete> getIssues()

        all issues in the domain.
